languages.text: {n}Кассия понимающе улыбается.{/n} "В таком случае, Лорд-капитан, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине. И обдумать... случившееся".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия понимающе улыбается.{/n} "В таком случае, Лорд-капитан, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине. И обдумать... случившееся".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia's smile is understanding.{/n} "In that case, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has happened."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия понимающе улыбается.{/n} "В таком случае, Лорд-капитан, я бы хотела провести немного времени наедине. И обдумать... случившееся".

languages.text: {n}Cassia esboza una sonrisa comprensiva.{/n} «En ese caso, Lord Capitán, quisiera pasar un rato a solas. Y pensar en... lo que ha ocurrido».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's smile is understanding.{/n} "In that case, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia esboza una sonrisa comprensiva.{/n} «En ese caso, Lord Capitán, quisiera pasar un rato a solas. Y pensar en... lo que ha ocurrido».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは理解を示すように微笑んだ。{/n}「では、しばしひとりにしていただきたいです、ロード・キャプテン。今、何が起きたのか…少し考えたいと思います」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's smile is understanding.{/n} "In that case, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは理解を示すように微笑んだ。{/n}「では、しばしひとりにしていただきたいです、ロード・キャプテン。今、何が起きたのか…少し考えたいと思います」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅露出理解的微笑。{/n}“既然这样，舰长大人，我想一个人待一会，好好思考一下……刚刚发生的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's smile is understanding.{/n} "In that case, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅露出理解的微笑。{/n}“既然这样，舰长大人，我想一个人待一会，好好思考一下……刚刚发生的事情。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia affiche un sourire compréhensif.{/n} « Dans ce cas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, j'aimerais passer un moment seule. Pour réfléchir à... ce qu'il vient de se passer. »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's smile is understanding.{/n} "In that case, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has happened."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia affiche un sourire compréhensif.{/n} « Dans ce cas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, j'aimerais passer un moment seule. Pour réfléchir à... ce qu'il vient de se passer. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia lächelt verständnisvoll.{/n} "Wenn das so ist, Lord Captain, wäre ich gerne ein wenig allein. Um darüber nachzudenken ... was geschehen ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's smile is understanding.{/n} "In that case, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has happened."

languages.original_text: {n}Cassia's smile is understanding.{/n} "In that case, Lord Captain, I would like to spend some time alone. And think about... what has happened."

languages.text: {n}Cassia anlayışla gülümsüyor.{/n} "O hâlde biraz yalnız kalmak istiyorum Lord Kaptan. Tüm... Olan biteni düşünmek istiyorum."
